meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively protective or cautious.
meanings.sent1: Her overprotectiveness towards her children made it difficult for them to learn independence.
meanings.sent2: His overprotectiveness towards his phone led him to buy multiple cases and screen protectors.
meanings.sent3: The dog's overprotectiveness of its favorite toy was both endearing and slightly annoying.
meanings.sent4: The overprotectiveness of the castle walls shielded the kingdom from any outside threats.
meanings.sent5: The overprotectiveness of the security guard made it nearly impossible for anyone to enter the building without clearance.

meanings.definition: Excessive concern for the safety or well-being of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The mother's overprotectiveness of her child made her check on him every few minutes.
meanings.sent2: His overprotectiveness of his car made him park it far away from other vehicles to avoid any scratches.
meanings.sent3: The overprotectiveness of the lifeguard towards the inflatable pool toys was both amusing and unnecessary.
meanings.sent4: The overprotectiveness of the tree branches sheltered the birds from the harsh winds.
meanings.sent5: The overprotectiveness of the librarian towards the rare books ensured they remained in pristine condition.
